thread.title: Brighton v Wolves now on New Year's Day
thread.title_full: Brighton v Wolves now on New Year's Day

title: Brighton v Wolves now on New Year's Day
text:
Tweet 
The fixture has been moved forward 24 hours, from Saturday January 2, and will be broadcast live with a 3pm kick-off. 
Kenny Jackett’s men will now feature in four televised games in three weeks around the turn of the year, after it was yesterday announced three of their December fixtures were being moved. 
They will now host Nottingham Forest a day earlier on December 11, at 7.45pm in a Friday night game at Molineux. More on this story:
